A gallery for me to play with design skills and libraries. Mainly built with THREE.JS and p5.

works.title: Full Stack Engineer
details: Built **post systems** to empower teachers to well promote themselves
Deployed and ran server-side applications with GCP products such as **Cloud Run** and **GCS** and **Job Scheduler**
Led **3-person team** to design and implement fullstack system

works.title: Frontend Engineer
works.overview: Built EduTech app with **NextJS**, **React Query** and **ChakraUI**
details: Built web streaming and chat system with **Twilio API**
Implemented unit tests with **React Testing Library**
Collaborate with UI designer to build a component library with **Storybook**
Introduced an admin system to control teacher-student relationship

works.title: UI Engineer
works.overview: Built a food delivery platform with **Expo** and **GatsbyJS**
details: Built a customer-side web app with GatsbyJS and Ant Design
Built a store-side mobile app with Expo and React Native Paper

openSources.title: Collaborator
details: Built docs and developed the landing page
Collaborate with designers and engineers to design new components

React: Experienced with React development for the past 3 years, well-versed in its core concepts, principles, and practical application. Proficient in independently architecting SPA with plain React and MPA with NextJS. Familiar with popular community libraries such as React Query, Chakra UI and React Testing Library. Experience in driving mobile apps with React Native
NodeJS: A year of hands-on experience in developing and deploying server-side applications from the ground up. Skilled in designing RESTful APIs and data structures using NestJS and MondoDB
GCP: A year of hands-on experience in Google Cloud. Experience in running server-side applications with Cloud Run and GCS, and scheduling with Cloud Function
